title: What the Jordan Peterson movement might learn from the Billy Graham story
description:
Billy Graham was a man of HUGE influence in the development of post WW2 culture. While some JBP fans watch his rise in influence it is nothing compared to what Graham achieved. Graham wasn't just a popular preacher, he avoided the pitfalls of money, sex and power that took out other preaches like Jimmy Swaggart and James Bakker by building a powerful institution. Will JBP satisfy himself with dark web celebrity appearances and a best selling book or will he plan strategically to build institutions that will stabilize and amplify his influence? 

JBP verbally prophesies about himself that he'll have a great fall. What can he do to prevent or mitigate this prophesied fall? 

Washington Post Story on Graham's Deficiencies as a Father https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/acts-of-faith/wp/2018/02/21/divorce-drugs-drinking-billy-grahams-children-and-their-absent-father/

Christianity today piece "Lead us not into Scandal" http://www.christianitytoday.com/ct/2018/billy-graham/lead-us-not-into-scandal.html

George Will on Billy Graham https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/billy-graham-was-no-prophet-thats-why-america-loved-him/2018/02/21/398ce31a-1722-11e8-92c9-376b4fe57ff7_story.html

https://billygraham.org/
